GK16msabdvvu:7: vyāpāraś ca śṛṅgagrāhikayā darśayituṃ na yujyate iti viṣayamukhena pradarśyate --
GK16msabdvvu:8: jātiḥ kriyā guṇaḥ saṃjñā vācyo 'rthaḥ samitadhvaniḥ /
GK16msabdvvu:9: agṛhītasaṅketasya śabdasyārthapratipatter abhāvāt saṅketasahāya eva śabdo 'rthaṃ pratipādayati /
GK16msabdvvu:10: tena samitaḥ saṅketito dhvaniḥ śabdo yatra yo 'rthaḥ /
GK16msabdvvu:11: pūrvam upalabhyatvān na tu viśrāntidhāmatvān mukhya iti prasiddho vācyo 'bhidheyo 'rthaḥ /
GK16msabdvvu:14: tathāpy ānantyad vyabhicārāc ca tatra saṅketaḥ kartum na pāryata iti gauḥ śuklaś calo ḍittha ityādīnām ekārthatvaṃ mā prasāṅkṣīd iti ca śabdānām upādhāv eva saṅketaḥ /
GK16msabdvvu:17: siddho 'pi dvividhaḥ padārthasya prāṇaprado viśeṣādhānahetuś ca /
GK16msabdvvu:19: uktaṃ hi vākyapadīye -- “gaur hi svarūpeṇa na gauḥ,
GK16msabdvvu:25: ḍitthādiśabdānāṃ antyabuddhinirgrāhyaṃ saṃhṛtakramaṃ svarūpaṃ vaktrā yadṛcchayā ḍitthādiṣv artheṣūpādhitayā saṃniveśyate iti ca saṃjñārūpo yadṛcchātmaka iti /
GK16msabdvvu:26: gauḥ śuklaś calo ḍittha ityādau catuṣṭayī śabdānāṃ pravṛttir bhāṣye kathitā /
GK16msabdvvu:28: nanu payaḥśaṅkhādyāśrayībhūteṣu śuklādiguṇeṣu yadvaśena śuklaḥ śukla ity abhinnāv abhidhānapratyayau stas tacchuklatvādisāmānyam /
GK16msabdvvu:30: śukasārikādyudīriteṣu ḍitthādiśabdeṣu ca ḍitthādiśabdatvaṃ pratikṣaṇaṃ bhidyamāne vā ḍitthādyarthe ḍitthāditvam astīti katham catuṣṭayī śabdānāṃ pravṛttiḥ /
GK16msabdvvu:32: saṃsthānāvasthānapramāṇavarṇair bhede 'pi vyaktīnāṃ śābaleyo gauḥ dhāvaleyo gaur ityādyekapratyayahetutvaṃ jāter eva /
GK16msabdvvu:33: haṃsahārādīnāṃ ghṛtaguḍādīnāṃ śukasārikādyudīritaḍitthādiśabdānāṃ nānāvasthaḍitthādyarthānāṃ ca bhede 'pi haṃsaḥ śuklaḥ,
GK16msabdvvu:38_0: ḍittho ḍittha ityekākārāvagatinibandhanatvād ekarūpatvam eva guṇakriyāyadṛcchānām
GK16msabdvvu:38_1: iti naitāsāṃ bhinneṣv abhinnābhidhānapratyayahetur jātir ghaṭata iti catvāry eva
GK16msabdvvu:41: śabde kuśala ityādau darbhagrahaṇādyayogāt gaṅgāyāṃ ghoṣa ityādau ca gaṅgādīnāṃ ca ghoṣādhikaraṇatāsaṃbhavāt mukhyārthasya bādhaḥ,
GK16msabdvvu:42: rūḍitaḥ prasiddheḥ tathā gaṅgātaṭa ityāder yeṣāṃ na tathā pratipattis teṣāṃ pāvanatvādīnāṃ tathāpratipādanātmanā prayojanena /
GK16msabdvvu:47: upādānaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ cety uktā śuddhaiva sā dvividhā // 2 //
GK16msabdvvu:48: kuntān praveśaya yaṣṭī praveśayetyādau kuntādibhir ātmanaḥ praveśasiddhaye svasaṃyoginaḥ puruṣā ākṣipyante /
GK16msabdvvu:50: “gaur anubandhyaḥ” ityādau śruticoditam anubandhanaṃ kathaṃ me syād iti jātyā vyaktir ākṣipyate na tu śabdenocyate /
GK16msabdvvu:51: “viśeṣyaṃ nābhidhā gacchet kṣiṇaśaktir viśeṣaṇe” iti nyāyād upādānalakṣaṇā nodāhartavyā /
GK16msabdvvu:52: na hy atra prayojanam asti na vā rūḍhiḥ /
GK16msabdvvu:53: vyaktyavinābhāvāt tu jātyā vyaktir ākṣipyate yathā kriyatām ity atra kartā,
GK16msabdvvu:55: praviśa piṇḍīm ityādau gṛhaṃ bhakṣayetyādi ca /
GK16msabdvvu:56: pīno devadatto divā na bhuṅkte ity atra ca rātribhojanaṃ na lakṣyate /
GK16msabdvvu:58: gaṅgāyāṃ ghoṣa ity atra taṭasya ghoṣādhikaraṇatāyāḥ siddhaye gaṅgāśabdaḥ svārtham arpayatīty evamādau lakṣaṇenaiṣā lakṣaṇā /
GK16msabdvvu:60: anayor bhedayor lakṣyasya lakṣakasya ca na bhedarūpaṃ taṭasthatvam /
GK16msabdvvu:61: taṭādīnāṃ gaṅgādiśabdaiḥ pratipādane tattvapratipattau hi pratipipādayiṣitaprayojanasampratyayaḥ /
GK16msabdvvu:62: gaṅgāsambandhamātrapratītau tu gaṅgātaṭe ghoṣa iti mukhyaśabdābhidhānāl lakṣaṇāyāḥ ko bhedaḥ //
GK16msabdvvu:63: sāropānyā tu yatroktau viṣayī viṣayas tathā /
GK16msabdvvu:64: āropyamāṇa āropaviśayaś ca yatrānupahnutabhedau sāmānādhikaraṇyena nirdiśyete sā lakṣaṇā sāropā /
GK16msabdvvu:67: bhedāv imau ca sādṛśyāt saṃbandhāntaratas tathā /
GK16msabdvvu:69: imāv āropādhyavasānarūpau sādṛśyahetū gaur vāhīka ity atra gaur ayam ity atra ca /
GK16msabdvvu:70: atra svārthasahacāriṇo guṇā jāḍyamāndyādayo lakṣyamāṇā api gośabdasya parārthābhidhānaṃ prati nimittatvam upayāntīti kecit /
GK16msabdvvu:71: svārthasahacāriguṇābhedena parārthagatā guṇā eva lakṣyante na tu parārtho 'bhidhīyata ity apare /
GK16msabdvvu:72: sādhāraṇaguṇāśrayaṇena parārtha eva lakṣyata ity anye /
GK16msabdvvu:75: lakṣyamāṇaguṇair yogād vṛtter iṣṭā tu gauṇatā
GK16msabdvvu:76: iti / avinābhāvo 'tra sambandhamātraṃ na tu nāntarīyakatvam /
GK16msabdvvu:77: tattve hi mañcāḥ krośantītyādau lakṣaṇā na syāt /
GK16msabdvvu:78: avinābhāve cākṣepeṇaiva siddher lakṣaṇāyā nopayoga ity uktam /
GK16msabdvvu:79: yena gogatajāḍyamāndyādisadṛśajāḍyamāndyetyādy ucyate tena guṇābhedābhyupagame guṇajātiprasaṅgāc catuṣṭayī śabdānāṃ pravṛttir uktā vyāhanyate /
GK16msabdvvu:81: āyur evedam ityādau sādṛśyād anyaḥ kāryakāraṇabhāvādiḥ paraḥ sambandhaḥ /
GK16msabdvvu:83: atra gauṇabhedayor bhede 'pi tādrūpyapratītiḥ sarvathāivābhedāvagamaś ca prayojanam /
GK16msabdvvu:95: sā ca “vaktur vākyasya vācyasya rūpabhedād vibhidyate” /
GK16msabdvvu:97: upakṛtaṃ bahu tatra kim ucyate sujanatā prathitā bhavatā param /
GK16msabdvvu:98: vidadhad īdṛśam eva sadā sakhe sukhitam āssva tataḥ śaradām śatam //
GK16msabdvvu:99: bahubhir upakārais tāpyamānasya kasyacid uktir iyam /
GK16msabdvvu:100: ato vaktṛmahimnā mūrkhe bṛhaspatiḍśabdena mūrkhatvam ivāpakāriṇi durjanatvādy atra lakṣyate /
GK16msabdvvu:104: nīvīṃ prati praṇihite ca kare priyeṇa
GK16msabdvvu:105: sakhyaḥ śapāmi yadi kiṃcid api smarāmi //
GK16msabdvvu:113: atra prāṇasamasya vyasane 'pi taṭasthas tṛṇamātram api dātum asamarthaś ca vācyaḥ /
GK16msabdvvu:114: evaṃ dvikabhedās trayaḥ trikabhedaś caika udāhāryaḥ /
GK16msabdvvu:115: dṛṣṭiṃ he prativeśini kṣaṇam ihāpy asmadgṛhe dāsyasi
GK16msabdvvu:116: prāyo naiva śiśoḥ pitāsya virasāḥ kaupīr apaḥ pāsyasi /
GK16msabdvvu:117: ekākiny api yāmi tad drutam itaḥ srotas tamālākulaṃ
GK16msabdvvu:120: prāptaśrīr eṣa kasmāt punar api mayi taṃ manthakhedaṃ vidadhyān
GK16msabdvvu:121: nidrām apy asya pūrvām analasamanaso naiva sambhāvayāmi /
GK16msabdvvu:122: setuṃ badhnāti bhūyaḥ kim iti ca sakaladvīpanāthānuyāte
GK16msabdvvu:123: tvayy āyāte vitarkān iti dadhata ivābhāti kampaḥ payodheḥ //
GK16msabdvvu:125: durvārā madaneṣavo diśi diśi vyājṛmbhate mādhavo
GK16msabdvvu:128: soḍhavyāḥ sakhi sāmprataṃ katham amī pañcāgnayo duḥsahā //
GK16msabdvvu:129: ity atra ca nādeyapānīyānayanena parapuruṣasambhogasya naḍagranthalekhanena sambhāvyamānanakhadaśanakṣatānāṃ ca nihnavātmakaṃ vastu,
GK16msabdvvu:131: vipralambhaśṛṅgāraś ca raso lakṣyata iti nodāhāryam /
GK16msabdvvu:134: ākṣiptasyālaṅkārasya lakṣyatve ca vahnyānayane pātrānayanasya lakṣyatvaprasaṅgāt /
GK16msabdvvu:136: saprayojanāyāṃ ca lakṣaṇāyāṃ tadatirikto vyāpāro 'vaśyam aṅgīkartavyaḥ /
GK16msabdvvu:138: tac ca na mukhyārthabādhanimittavat pramāṇāntarād boddhavyam /
GK16msabdvvu:144: satyām api vā tasyāṃ niyatasmaraṇaṃ na syāt /
GK16msabdvvu:148: na lakṣaṇā tasmin sati hi sā na tu tadviṣayā /
GK16msabdvvu:151: tasyāpi lakṣaṇe 'navasthāpattir iti na lakṣaṇā syāt /
GK16msabdvvu:155_0: nanu gaṅgātaṭe ghoṣa ityādisvaśabdād yādṛgarthapratītir na bhavati tādṛśī gaṅgāyāṃ
GK16msabdvvu:155_1: ghoṣa ityādes tad eva prayojanaṃ pāvanatvādidharmākrāntaṃ ca taṭādi lakṣyate iti
GK16msabdvvu:155_2: viśiśṭe lakṣaṇā na tu lakṣite viśeṣāḥ /
GK16msabdvvu:156: evaṃ hi taṭādeḥ pāvanatvādīnāṃ ca dharmadharmibhāvaś caturtho vyāpāra urarīkartavyaḥ /
GK16msabdvvu:158: na ca vyāpārasya lakṣaṇātmano vyañjanātmā vyāpāro bhavati /
GK16msabdvvu:160: tarhi lakṣaṇāyāḥ prayojanaṃ tasmād viśiṣṭam eva lakṣyate /
GK16msabdvvu:165: sāmānyaniṣṭhaś ca saṅketa iti tritayātmanā saṅketabhedena lakṣaṇā sā kathaṃ viśiṣṭaṃ gocarīkuryāt /
GK16msabdvvu:167: kiṃca lakṣaṇāyā gocaro lakṣyo na prayojanam /
GK16msabdvvu:171: evaṃ hy abhidhāyā api phalaṃ śabdasya ca vācakasya saṃvid eva phalam /
GK16msabdvvu:172: tac ca vinā vyāpārān na sambhavati /
GK16msabdvvu:173: na ca vyāpārasya vyāpāra iti śabdasyaivāsau vācyaḥ /
GK16msabdvvu:174: lakṣaṇānvayavyatirekānuvidhānaṃ ca savyāpārasya phalasyeti tasyās tat kāryaṃ kāryaṃ ca phalam ucyate /
GK16msabdvvu:175: kriyāntaraprāpyasya yāgaphalatvam iva vyañjanaśaktinirvartyasya prayojanasya lakṣaṇāphalatvam /
GK16msabdvvu:176: nīlaviṣayasya pramāṇasya yathā nīlaniṣṭhaiva prakaṭatā saṃvid vā phalam tadval lakṣaṇāyās tadviṣayaniṣṭham eva prayojanam /
GK16msabdvvu:178: tena siddham etal lakṣaṇāyā atirikto vyāpāraḥ samāśraṇīyaḥ //
GK16msabdvvu:179: nirūḍhā kācanānyā tu kāryā sā kācid anyathā /
GK16msabdvvu:180: anulomapratikūlādiśabdeṣu kācana sā vācyam arthaṃ parihṛtya lakṣya evārthe vācakavan nirūḍhā /
GK16msabdvvu:184: ityādāv andhādiśabdeṣu anupapadyamānatvād vācyam atyantatiraskṛtam iti vicchāyatvasya lakṣitasyāsāmānyatvaṃ vyaṅgyam / tathā --
GK16msabdvvu:185: sa puruṣaḥ sa ca jīvati satkṛtaṃ
GK16msabdvvu:190: rephadvayānugatabhramarādiśabdābhidheyatve dvirephaśabdaḥ ṣaṭpade yathā prayujyate tathā kokilādau dvika ityādikā anyathā na prayojyāḥ /
GK16msabdvvu:192: ihānantyād vyabhicārāc ca vākyasya vākyārtha iva viśeṣarūpe padārthe padasya saṅketaḥ kartuṃ na pāryate iti sāmānya eva saṅketaḥ /
GK16msabdvvu:193: ākāṅkṣāsannidhiyogyatāvaśāt sāmānyānām abhihitānāṃ satām anvaya iti padārthānāṃ vaiśiṣṭyam /
GK16msabdvvu:195: atra pakṣe pūrvam abhidhā tato 'nvayabādhe lakṣaṇā /
GK16msabdvvu:197: devadatta gām ānayetyady uttamavṛddhavākyaśravaṇān madhyamavṛddhau viśiṣṭaṃ vyāpāraṃ karotīti dṛṣṭvā vyutpādyamāno nirvibhāge 'rthe nirvibhāgaṃ vākyaṃ vācakaṃ jānāti /
GK16msabdvvu:198_0: tato yajñadatta gām ānayetyādivākyāntaraprayoge sati anvayavyatirekābhyāṃ niyatasya
GK16msabdvvu:198_1: niyatārtham avasyatīti sāmānyāvacchādite viśiṣṭa eva padārthe padānāṃ saṅketa ity
GK16msabdvvu:198_2: anvitānām eva satām abhidhānam iti viśiṣṭānāṃ padārthatā /
GK16msabdvvu:199: atra pakṣe abhidhāyāḥ pura ādau lakṣaṇā,
GK16msabdvvu:202: padāpekṣayābhihitānvayaḥ vākyāpekṣayā tv anvitābhidhānam iti dvayapakṣe dvayam /
GK16msabdvvu:206: padeṣu varṇavad vākyeṣu hi padānām anarthakatvam /
GK16msabdvvu:208: kaśābhidhānāt turagasya yathā preṣito 'ham anena dhāvana iti pratibhodeti tadvat pratibhāvaśād viśiṣtavākyāt pratipattir iti saiva vākyārthaḥ /
GK16msabdvvu:209: asatyabhūtaprakṛtipratyayādikalpanavad avidyāpade padārthakalpanāyāṃ tūkteṣu pakṣeṣu trayaḥ pakṣāḥ /
GK16msabdvvu:210: yaś ca sambandho lakṣaṇāyā nimittaṃ taṃ pañcavidham āhuḥ / yathoktaṃ
GK16msabdvvu:212: vaiparītyāt kriyāyogāl lakṣaṇā pañcadhā matā // iti /
GK16msabdvvu:214: tatsambandhāt tena ṣaṭpado lakṣyate iti abhidheyasambandhanimittatā /
GK16msabdvvu:215: sādṛśyād yathā siṃho māṇavaka iti / yathā vā --
GK16msabdvvu:216: varṣe samasta evaikaḥ ślāghyaḥ ko 'py eṣa vāsaraḥ /
GK16msabdvvu:217: dinair mahattayānveyo yo na pūrvair na cāparaiḥ //
GK16msabdvvu:218: atra prakaraṇavaśād mahāpuruṣaḥ kaścil lakṣyate yasya kule pūrve bhāvino vā puruṣā na samānatvam upayānti /
GK16msabdvvu:223: atra hi chatrisāhacaryād achatrā apy evaṃ vyapadiśyante /
GK16msabdvvu:226: pṛthur asi guṇaiḥ kīrtyā rāmo nalo bharato bhavān
GK16msabdvvu:227: mahati samara śatrughnas tvaṃ tathā janakaḥ sthiteḥ /
GK16msabdvvu:229: katham asi na māṃdhātā deva trilokavijayy api //
GK16msabdvvu:233_0: yathā saṃketena mukhyārthabādhāditritayena ca sahāyenābhidhāyako lakṣakaś ca yathā
GK16msabdvvu:233_1: vā pakṣadharmānvayavyatirekasahagato vivakṣāyā anumāpakaḥ tathā pratibhānair malyavidagdhaparicayaprakaraṇādijñānasāpekṣo
GK16msabdvvu:233_2: vācako lakṣyakaś ca vyaṅgyam arthaṃ dhvaniśabdo vyanakti /
GK16msabdvvu:241: attā ettha ṇimajjai ettha ahaṃ diasaaḥ paloehi /
GK16msabdvvu:242: mā pahia rattiandhaa sejjāe maha ṇimajjahisi //
GK16msabdvvu:244: mā pathika rātryandha śayyāyām āvayor nimaṅkṣyasi // ]
GK16msabdvvu:246: lakṣaṇāmūlaṃ yathā -- niśvāsāndha ivādarśa ity udāhṛtam /
GK16msabdvvu:251: kvāste duryodhano 'sau kathayata na ruṣā draṣṭum abhyāgatau svaḥ //
GK16msabdvvu:252: atraite varākā dāsabhāvaṃ gatāḥ kiṃ kariṣyanti asmadekaśaraṇāḥ paribhaviṣyanti ityādi dyūtakāle bhavadbhiś cintitam āsīn nāsmakaṃ vismṛtam /
GK16msabdvvu:253: tatra kācit pratikriyā nirvyūḍhā na kiṃ nirvyūḍhā ityādikaṃ tam artham abhivyajya sarvair eva kartā dyūtachalānām ityādibhir vācya evārthe viśramyate /
GK16msabdvvu:259: atra dattasaṃketaḥ puruṣo vānīralatāgṛhaṃ praviṣṭa iti vyaṅgyam artham avagamayya vācyo 'rthaḥ svaprādhānyenāsti /
GK16msabdvvu:260: na caivam abhidhāyā lakṣaṇāyā vā kaścid avasara iti bhinnam eva dhvananam /
GK16msabdvvu:262: iti vyaṅgyābhimato 'pi tātparyāt katham na vācyaḥ /
GK16msabdvvu:263_0: iha sarvāṇy eva kārakāṇi kārakatvāt savyāpārāṇīti sādhyāyamānāny ato bhūtabhavyasamuccāraṇe
GK16msabdvvu:263_1: “bhūtaṃ bhavyāyopadiśyata” ity adagdhadahananyāyena yāvad avahitaṃ tāvad vidhīyate
GK16msabdvvu:265: evaṃ hi pūrvo dhāvatīty aparārthe 'pi tātparyaṃ syāt /
GK16msabdvvu:269: evaṃ ca vācyatve kā vārttā vācyaviparītātmano vyaṅgyasya /
GK16msabdvvu:270: na tu vyaṅgyam anumeyam iti śakyaṃ vaktum /
GK16msabdvvu:271: na hi vācyavyaṅgyayoḥ pratibandhagrahe kiñcit pramāṇaṃ kramate /
GK16msabdvvu:275: evaṃbhūtāyāṃ pramāṇair apratipannāyāṃ hi sāmagryām upapattim anapekṣyāpi samudayamānā pratītiḥ kena nihnotuṃ śakyata iti /
GK16msabdvvu:277: etac cānyatra vistareṇa vicāritam iti saṃkṣepeṇehoktam iti śivam //
